column4: change the variable doc-view-continuous to a non-nil value in emacs?
how to change the variable doc-view-continuous to a non-nil value in emacs?
M-x customize-variable, setq
the variable is not listed in the list(auto-completion list)?
it might not be set by default
try (setq <variable name> 1)
could you write the entire command?
I forgot the name of the variable you wanted to configure, but that was the whole thing
put it *scratch* and execute it for immediate effects, or put it in your .emacs to have it run every time you start emacs
run (setq doc-view-continuous t) in *scratch*, like i said before
how is it to be run?
open up the *scratch* buffer, put that code in, put the cursor right after the closing paren, then do C-j
k
it can also be added to the ~/.emacs file
